headline: Triangle Head
description: An abstract artwork blending archetypal figures — a triangle-headed being, a human with a fire-heart, and waves of shifting lines — surfacing raw from the subconscious.
resonantThread: Totem Current — archetypes surfacing raw from subconscious imagery.
whyItMatters: This piece embodies the Totem Current phase, where subconscious archetypes emerge directly into form without refinement — playful yet potent symbols of internal myth.

motifMap.meaning: An archetypal figure, playful but uncanny, surfacing raw from the subconscious.
The self bearing the flame of spirit amidst abstract chaos.
Energetic currents surrounding and shaping the figures.

articleExcerpt: Triangle Head stands in abstract waves of ink and color. Totemic, playful, and raw — a surfacing from the subconscious into form.
sourceFragments: Artwork showing a triangle-headed figure surrounded by shifting abstract lines and a fire-hearted human form at the edge of the page.

associatedMedia.description: A doodle-style artwork depicting abstract figures: triangle head, fire-heart human, flowing lines.

fieldDefinitions.headline: Title of the post
fieldDefinitions.author: Creator of the piece
fieldDefinitions.resonantThread: Thread or theme it resonates with
